Title: Ode To Dawn's Drum 

In the market aisles of Argos, £10 buys one twilight tug⁠.
An Acctim's Remi analogue, a morn's defiant shrug. 
Tick-free, yet echoing, bounding through the abyss,
Between the slumber's stronghold and the waking world's kiss.
The Geemarc Wake'N'Shake Voyager, a titan in the mist,
Super loud, super proud, impossible to resist.
